author: Slobrojoe
title: Perfect for a city scape
review:
The New York City taxi? Cool. In Lego? Even better!

Box/Instructions

This set is packed as a poly bag. It contains a foldable leaflet instruction book.

Parts 

Guess what? They're yellow like the taxi! There are also a couple of whites thrown in. The most interesting parts are the slanted windscreens and the 2 doors on either side.

Build 

This build is fairly simple, meaning almost anyone can finish it under 5 minutes.

Pros:

-Relative colour scheme

-Accurate

-Cheap

-Works really well in a city build

Cons: 

-Would be great if the slanted windscreens were further apart so a minifig could sit inside, even if it wasn't included in the bag

Overall, the build is cool and worth 4 stars.
